summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.6°C) and outside temperature (up 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.7 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1722 m), light levels (up 3676 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 136.7m lower than yesterday, 621.7m lower than the past week, 1722.4m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 930.3m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1551.9m and 2650m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and near calm conditions. Periods of rain anticipated, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
